body: Creatures with the advanced template are fiercer and more powerful than their ordinary cousins.
name: Advanced Creature

sections.body: +2 on all rolls (including damage rolls) and special ability DCs; +4 to AC and CMD; +2 hp/HD.
sections.name: Quick Rules

sections.body: AC increase natural armor by +2; Ability Scores +4 to all ability scores (except Int scores of 2 or less).
sections.name: Rebuild Rules
